com.kplike.library.util

类 APILevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kplike.library.util.APILevel

  • public class APILevel
extends java.lang.Object
    APILevel helps to check device API Build.VERSION conveniently.
    作者:
    Marcos Trujillo, Leonardo Taehwan Kim

    • 方法详细资料

      • require

        public static boolean require(int level)
        参数:
        level - minimum API level version that has to support the device
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least level

      • requireCupcake

        public static boolean requireCupcake()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least Cupcake 3

      • requireDonut

        public static boolean requireDonut()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least Donut 4

      • requireEclair

        public static boolean requireEclair()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least Eclair 5

      • requireFroyo

        public static boolean requireFroyo()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least Froyo 8

      • requireGingerbread

        public static boolean requireGingerbread()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least GingerBread 9

      • requireHoneycomb

        public static boolean requireHoneycomb()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least Honeycomb 11

      • requireHoneycombMR2

        public static boolean requireHoneycombMR2()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least Honeycomb 3.2, 13

      • requireIceCreamSandwich

        public static boolean requireIceCreamSandwich()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least ICS 14

      • requireJellyBean

        public static boolean requireJellyBean()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least JellyBean 16

      • requireJellyBeanMR1

        public static boolean requireJellyBeanMR1()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least JellyBean MR1 17

      • requireJellyBeanMR2

        public static boolean requireJellyBeanMR2()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least JellyBean MR2 18

      • requireKitkat

        public static boolean requireKitkat()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least Kitkat 19

      • requireLollipop

        public static boolean requireLollipop()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least Lollipop 21

      • requireLollipopMR1

        public static boolean requireLollipopMR1()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least Lollipop MR1 22

      • requireMarshmallow

        public static boolean requireMarshmallow()
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is at least Marshmallow 23

      • deprecatedAt

        public static boolean deprecatedAt(int level)
        参数:
        level - API level version that specific method or variable has been deprecated
        返回:
        true when the caller API version is less than level

      • deprecatedAtCupcake
